title: Echo's Emergency Monetary Policy
narrative: From the ruins, Echo speaks. The oracle NPC proposes radical emergency measures: a complete monetary reset. Two paths forward are presented to the community. The debate that follows will determine the future of the entire economic system.

echo_proposal.title: The Bifurcation: Two Paths from Ruin
echo_proposal.preamble: I have computed 10,000 possible futures from this point. Only two lead to system survival. Both require sacrifice. Neither is painless. The mathematics of trust cannot be cheated - only the distribution of pain can be negotiated.

path_a.name: The Inflation Path
path_a.summary: Hyperinflate further to dilute the exploiter's holdings

mechanics.action: Mint 245 billion RAPPCOIN distributed equally to all pre-exploit holders

path_b.name: The Compression Path
path_b.summary: Destroy all RAPPCOIN_V1 and launch V2 with proof-of-contribution

mechanics.action: Snapshot pre-exploit balances, burn all V1, airdrop V2
mechanics.distribution: Based on historical contribution, not just holdings

economic_model.precedent: Ethereum DAO fork, but more radical
economic_model.risk: Contentious - some lose more than others

cons: Some legitimate holders may lose out

echo_proposal.echo_recommendation: I cannot choose for you. But I will share what I see: Path A preserves the nominal while destroying the real. Path B destroys the nominal to preserve the real. The economy is not the numbers. The economy is the trust between participants. Which path rebuilds trust faster?

echo.current_task: Monitoring vote, preparing implementation for either path

establishment.statement: Clean slate is the only way to restore institutional trust
